issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for Parquet schema merging
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11017](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11017). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for Parquet schema merging so that we can read data sets where some files have additional columns.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11017?focusedCommentId=17287787) by QP Hou (houqp):*
The Schema struct does have a try_merge method defined, should we just reuse that one?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11017?focusedCommentId=17332326) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/132
